title: How to write school in Chinese - Quora

response.answer_text: Human beings rarely speak in single words, so single word translations found in online dictionaries are not always useful. If you don’t provide any context, a translator has to guess at the many potential ways to write “school” in Chinese. 學校 xuéxiào / shyueshiaw is what you see if you type the English word “school” into Google Translate. In real life, however, there are many ways to say “school” depending on what kind of school you mean, your translation’s intended audience and the required tone, among other factors. Here are six more ways to translate “school” into Chinese (there are probably more): 1. kè / keh 台北市明天停課 táiběishì míngtiān tíngkè / tairbeeishyh mingtian tyngkeh “Schools are closed tomorrow” [official announcement] 2A. xué / shyue 明天不用上學 míngtiān bùyòng shàngxué / mingtian buhyonq shangshyue “There’s no school tomorrow” [conversational Chinese: 上學 = go to school]. 2B. 臺北市立天母國民小學 táiběi shìlì tiānmǔ guómín xiǎoxué / tairbeei shyhlih tianmuu gwomin sheaushyue “Taipei Municipal Tianmu Elementary School” [official title: 小學、中學、大學 xiǎoxué, zhōngxué, dàxué / sheaushyue, zhongshyue, dahshyue “elementary, middle, high school”] 3. yuàn / yuann 國立台灣大學醫學院 guólì táiwān dàxué yīxuéyuàn / gwolih tairuan dahshyue ishyueyuann “National Taiwan University School of Medicine” [official title] 4. xiǎo / sheau 天母國小 tiānmǔ guóxiǎo / tianmuu gwosheau “Tianmu Elementary School” [informal Chinese abbreviation] 5. suǒ / suoo 警犬訓練所 jǐngquǎn xùnliànsuǒ / jiingcheuan shiunnliannsuoo “police dog training school” 6. bān / ban 補習班 bǔxíbān / buushyiban “supplementary school, cram school”

“ School “ in Chinese is 学校 （ Xuéxiào ） Lets learn more about individual characters so that you can remember and also learn more out of this simple word 学 - Xué - study ， 大学 － Dàxué － literal meaning a big school i.e. University 学生 － Xuéshēng - literal meaning is birth & study i.e. Student 校 - xiào - School 高校 － Gāoxiào － literal meaning is high level schools i.e. colleges and universities 校长 － Xiàozhǎng － literal meaning is head of a school i.e. Principal Hope this helps !
